title: Jean's gingery chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['1.5L (2 1/2 pints) chicken stock', '3 carrots, chopped', '3 stalks celery, chopped', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper', '3 slices fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 boneless chicken breast fillets - cooked and chopped', '225g (8 oz) egg noodles']
